title: Bangladesh interim government chief hosts luncheon for outgoing advisers
body: The Bangladesh interim government chief adviser, Professor Muhammad Yunus, on Thursday hosted a luncheon in honour of outgoing advisers Md Mahfuj Alam and Asif Mahmud Shojib Bhuyain after the meeting of the council of advisers at his office in Tejgaon, Dhaka. The chief adviser also posed for a photograph with them after the meeting, said the chief adviserâ€™s press wing this afternoon. Earlier, on Wednesday, information and broadcasting adviser Mahfuj Alam and LGRD and youth and sports adviser Asif Mahmud Shojib Bhuyain submitted their resignation letters in person to the chief adviser at the State Guest House Jamuna. Their resignation will come into effect soon after the announcement of the election schedule for the upcoming general polls by the Election Commission.
